name: Mars Marine (SiegJester)
description:
Mars Marine is a shooter where you have to survive infinite waves of aliens.

I made this game as a part of my training in Unreal Engine, following one of GameDev.tv's courses. I added a bunch of features of my own, and might update it again in the future.

-CONTROLS-

  • Move with ESDF
  • Aim with mouse
  • Shoot with mouse left button (hold to maintain fire)
  • Pause with space
  • Gamepad controls are WIP, functionning for playing but not in the pause menu

Game saves high score when the player dies, no save available in-between waves of enemies.
